message:
SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 82
Semantic Technologies in the Web of Data.  Red.es.   4th December 2012 
VoID: Vocabulary of Interlinked Datasets 
•
RDFS vocabulary published by 
W3C  
 
•
VoID 
allows 
expressing 
metadata about RDF datasets 
 
•
VoID helps in the discovery and 
use of datasets by potential 
users 
(e.g., 
application 
developers, 
indexers, 
aggregators, etc.) 
84 
http://www.w3.org/TR/void/ 
•
General 
Metadata: 
license, 
author, topic, number of triples, 
etc. 
•
Access methods: 
SPARQL 
endpoint, downloaded files, etc. 
•
Structural metadata: resource 
examples, URI pattern, used 
vocabularies, etc. 
•
Linksets (datasets linked to the 
dataset): 
describe 
the 
used 
property 
(e.g. 
owl:sameAs, 
skos:closeMatch), linked dataset 
URI, link examples, etc.
speaker: SYSTEM
